mapper.select: /* boardAdmin.findAdminUserList */ SELECT BM.TEN_ID /*시스템 아이디 */ ,BM.BBD_UUID /*게시판_아이디 */ ,BM.CO_CD /*회사 코드 */ ,BM.USR_ID /*사용자_아이디 */ ,BM.REG_DTTM /*등록 일시 */ ,BM.REGR_ID /*등록자 아이디 */ ,USR.USR_NM /*이름*/ ,USR.USR_NM_EN /*이름*/ ,LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_NM AS COMP_NM /*회사*/ ,LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_NM_EN AS COMP_NM_EN /*회사*/ FROM BBD_MGR BM INNER JOIN USR USR ON USR.TEN_ID = BM.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = BM.CO_CD AND USR.USR_ID = BM.USR_ID INNER JOIN LOGIC_ORG LOGIC_ORG ON LOGIC_ORG.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' AND LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_CD = USR.CO_CD WHERE BM.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} /*시스템 아이디 */ AND BM.BBD_UUID = #{p.bbd_uuid} /*게시판_아이디 */
mapper.delete: /* boardAdmin.deleteAdminUser */ DELETE FROM BBD_MGR WHERE TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} /*시스템 아이디 */ AND BBD_UUID = #{p.bbd_uuid} /*게시판_아이디 */ AND CO_CD = #{p.co_cd} /*회사 코드*/ AND USR_ID = #{p.usr_id} /*사용자_아이디 */
mapper.select: /* boardAdmin.findBoardAuthList */ SELECT ROLE.TEN_ID /*시스템 아이디 */ ,ROLE.ROLE_CD /*롤 코드 */ ,ROLE.ROLE_NM /*롤 명 */ ,ROLE.ROLE_NM_EN /*롤 영문 명 */ ,#{p.bbd_uuid} AS BBD_UUID /*게시판id*/ ,BR.WRTG_PERM_YN /*쓰기*/ ,BR.SHOW_YN /*조회*/ FROM ROLE ROLE LEFT JOIN BBD_ROLE BR ON BR.ROLE_CD = ROLE.ROLE_CD AND BR.BBD_UUID = #{p.bbd_uuid} WHERE ROLE.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND ROLE.STS <> 'D' ORDER BY ROLE.ROLE_CD

/* boardAdmin.findCompanyListForBoard */ SELECT LO.LOGIC_ORG_CD AS CO_CD , LO.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN LO.LOGIC_ORG_NM_EN ELSE LO.LOGIC_ORG_NM END AS CO_NM , CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM BBD_CO BC WHERE BC.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND BC.BBD_UUID = #{p.bbd_uuid} AND BC.CO_CD = LO.LOGIC_ORG_CD ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS USE_YN , #{p.bbd_uuid} AS BBD_UUID FROM LOGIC_ORG LO WHERE LO.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND LO.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' AND LO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND LO.STS != 'D' ORDER BY LO.LOGIC_ORG_CD
